[[Killer B]] charges [[lightning]]-natured [[chakra]] through his arm, and runs towards his opponent in a similar manner to the [[Lightning Release: Lariat]].

== Trivia ==
* As with many of the techniques of [[Kumogakure]] ninja, this technique has an English name given kanji that somewhat match the pronunciation.

[[pt-br:Bombardeiro Crescente]]
[[pl:Raijingubonbā]]
